details.title: Never miss a moment again.
details.text:
Experience every thrilling sporting moment on the move with Sky sport Mobile TV subscription with Vodafone

  • Enjoy pack 2 of Sky Sports Mobile TV on Vodafone which gives you unlimited access to Sky Sports 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, F1 and Sky Sports News to pack even more sports into your life. Never miss live coverage of your favourite sports again
  • Available on iPhone and selected Android phones

checkbox.label: Vodafone terms and conditions
checkbox.errorMessage: Please check the Vodafone terms and conditions box to continue

accordion.label: Sky Sports Mobile TV
accordion.text:
Subscription

You get unlimited access to Sky Sports Mobile TV pack 2 for only €12.99 per month

Internet charges

You pay standard internet charges while roaming or if your have exceeded your monthly allowance

Supported phones

Sky Sports Mobile TV is only available on iPhone and selected Android phones.

okButton.label: Add Sky Sports Mobile TV pack 2

success.title: What happens next?
success.text:
Congratulations, you’re now ready to get your Sky sports Mobile TV app and start watching some great Sport

Download the Sky Sports Mobile TV app from the app store, open the app, select ‘I subscribe to Mobile TV with Vodafone’ and follow the instructions to start watching live sport on the go.

Please note, you need to be on the Vodafone network for the first time you access the app. Remember to switch off the WiFi

Sky Sports Mobile TV pack 2

Experience thrilling sporting moments with Sky sports Mobile TV

  • Enjoy Sky sports Mobile TV pack 2, including all the extra Sky Sports channels for only €12.99 per month.
  • Enjoy pack 2 of Sky Sports Mobile TV, including all the extra Sky Sports channels
  • Pack even more sports into your life and never miss live coverage of your favourite sports.
  • Available only on iPhones and selected Android phones.

For just €12.99 per month
